website_summaries.verdict: This is a great intermediary kart for tweens who need something fast.
pros: High speed of up to 12 miles per hour is good for older children, and the low frame means the kart won't flip over
Flat tires allow kart to drift
Forty-minute battery with impressive 12-hour charge time
cons: Difficult assembly, weak brakes, and cannot drive on grass

customer_reviews.title: Fun go-kart, easy assembly, our son loves it!
customer_reviews.text: This cart assembled quickly and easily. It fits our 6 year old son perfectly. With it being so low to the ground, we feel he’s safer than if he was on a kids atv. It goes pretty fast, but is fine for kids in this age range. We’d recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Joy E.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This go-kart is so fun! I got it for my 5 year old for her birthday and she love is! It is very low to the ground which is great when she makes a sharp turn. It is fast too!!! My older kids are jealous!
customer_reviews.author: Move Athletic

customer_reviews.title: What fun
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a Christmas present. First it was easy to assemble. Most of it was already together. They say 45 minutes, but it took me 15. Battery comes fully charged. That saved a lot of time. And most important, the grandson loved it. One thing, the description says two 12 volt batteries. I’m sure it does have two, but they are both contained in the battery pack. You don’t get to use one up and replace it with the other while charging the first. Having said the, the battery pack lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Breeding

customer_reviews.title: Works well, kids love it
customer_reviews.text: Nuf sed. Kid memories for a lifetime. Just what this great-grandpa would have wanted when he was a boy.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Gorski

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. We purchased this go cart for Christmas for our 8 year old son. He absolutely loves it and we’ve had no issues so far. We charged it for the recommended 12 hours and we were able to use it for more than an hour. Lots of fun!
customer_reviews.author: Gail Garcellano

customer_reviews.title: Not reliable
customer_reviews.text: Not to happy my son play with it for a couple weeks and was working. After a couple weeks not wheels started to get loose. Not holding up. It’s up to the point I won’t let him use it because I feel it’s not safe.
customer_reviews.author: kelvin peralta

customer_reviews.title: My son LOVES THIS!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great cart for the money. So much better than those big plastic ones you see in all the toy stores. And because it's all metal, it's much more durable.
customer_reviews.author: ReLLiK75

customer_reviews.title: Awesome fun
customer_reviews.text: 6yr old Son loves it and it can drive fast with my weight too
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: It was better then they said.
customer_reviews.text: Everything about it was great,my 4 year old grandson can drive it, so I bought 2 of them.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Chiaramonte

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: Heavy for one person to carry but so much fun for my 11yo daughter. I think the weight limit is 150 pounds and goes fast enough but not too fast.
customer_reviews.author: Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old loves this. The speed is perfect for him to handle. The power wheels are too slow he was complaining he wanted to go faster I recommend it
customer_reviews.author: michael fabbricatore

customer_reviews.title: My son LOVES this!
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for my son. He (and all the other neighborhood boys) have had so much fun with it!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Fun, well-made product
customer_reviews.text: Very wee-made product. Our daughter is 8 years old and it is perfect for her.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Be prepared to be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Mine doesn’t work out of the box. Battery charger suggests full after 18 hours charging (per instructions). Unfortunately doesn’t start. Terribly disappointed kid on his birthday.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Soooo fun!
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this go-kart. They won’t ever get off of it! I tried it myself, and darn it! It is super fun!!!
customer_reviews.author: Darby

customer_reviews.title: Fun Times!
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old loves it. It’s pretty fast and lasts about 40 min of continuous driving.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quit working after a few uses!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 7 year old just a few weeks ago. He loved it but it completely quit working just after a few uses! Battery is fully charged and it still won't move.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Razor Ground Force 24V Rechargeable Electric Go Kart, up to 12 MPH, Red

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars34 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
